0007695666.notes: 2 sectors @ 120 s (4 & 5); tess-ebs period ~17.5 d & morph 0.093; clear & deep eclipses with secondary nr phase 0.17 (high ecc); PDCSAP flatter than SAP;

0013957444.notes: 2 sectors @ 120 s (5 & 32); tess-ebs period ~3.74 d & morph 0.257; SpT F6V; clear eclipses - primary ~8% & secondary ~1.5%; secondary shallower than ideal but quick-fit indicates may be usable;

0022538139.notes: 2 sectors @ 120 s (8 & 61); tess-ebs period ~4.6 d morph 0.321; SpT A2Vs; clear deep primary (>10%) and shallow secondary (<1%) transit; well detached & dissimilar components; SAP flux generally better; despite shallow secondary may be worth trying

0024433067.notes: 1 sectors @ 120 s (5); tess-ebs period ~6.2 d & morph 0.466; SpT K0V+K2V; clear deep eclipses (>50% & 40%); SAP & PDCSAP similar; may need flattening/detrending;

0030313682.notes: ~20 sectors @ 120 s; tess-ebs period ~5.7 d morph 0.422; clear eclipses at <15% and 10%; lots of variability; SAP & PDCSAP similar; may need flattening/detrending;

0031810287.notes: 6 sectors @ 120 s (8, 9, 35, 36, 62 & 63); tess-ebs period ~4.8 d morph 0.233; deep primary ~25% and shallower secondary ~5%; lots of variability; SAP & PDCSAP similar; may need flattening/detrending;

0032759110.notes: 1 sector @ 120 s (6); tess-ebs period ~4.1 d morph 0.128; SpT M4.5Ve; clear eclipses at <14% and 12%; some of variability; SAP & PDCSAP similar; may need flattening/detrending; very interesting!;

0037606218.notes: 2 sectors @ 120 s (6 & 87); tess-ebs period ~7.8 d morph 0.210; clear eclipses at 10% and ~1%; PDCSAP fixes discontinuity in SAP on S87; secondary shallower than ideal but quick-fit indicates may be usable;

0048658291.notes: 1 sector @ 120 s (6); tess-ebs period ~3.2 d morph 0.400; clear eclipses of ~9% & 8%; some of variability between eclipses (& potentially ellipsoidal effect); SAP & PDCSAP similar;

0055404385.notes: >30 sectors @ 120 s; tess-ebs period ~2.95 d morph 0.324; SpT F5V; clear primary & secondary of ~10% & ~4%; some variability between eclipses beyound ellipsoidal effect;SAP & PDCSAP similar; potentially use a subset of quiet sectors (s2?)

0055497281.notes: >30 sectors @ 120 s; tess-ebs period ~14.9 d morph 0.070; SpT F8V; very clear primary & secondary of ~35% & ~30%; little variability between eclipses; SAP & PDCSAP similar; usually 2 to 3 eclipses per sector so maybe combine subset

0063579446.notes: 2 sectors @ 120 s (7 & 87); tess-ebs period ~5.6 d morph 0.382; clear eclipses of ~30% & 28%; sector 87 highly distorted however sector 7 is fine; SAP & PDCSAP similar;

0064783257.notes: 1 sector @ 120 s (7); tess-ebs period ~3.86 d morph 0.263; both eclipses ~10% although quite noisy as a faint target; PDCSAP better/flatter than SAP;

0066509654.notes: 2 sectors @ 120 s (7 & 61); tess-ebs period ~5.3 d morph 0.224; both eclipses ~20% although quite noisy as a faint target; some variability & flares between eclipses with PDCSAP better/flatter than SAP;

0066602813.notes: 6 sectors @ 120 s; tess-ebs period ~2.8 d morph 0.352; clear eclipses of ~40% and ~20%; some variability between eclipses; SAP & PDCSAP similar;

0077158150.notes: 2 sectors @ 120 s (4 & 5); tess-ebs period ~2.5 d morph 0.466; SpT A4V; aka V* RZ Cae; not in Gaia DR3 so parallax from Hipparcos; clear eclipses of ~20% and ~13%; ellipsoidal variation; SAP & PDCSAP similar

0078568736.notes: 3 sectors @ 120 s (6, 7 & 87); tess-ebs period ~8.2 d morph 0.159; SpT G; clear eclipses of ~40% and 10%; slow variability - may require flattening; ephemeris shifted between S6/7 and S87; SAP & PDCSAP similar;

0080556181.notes: 2 sectors @ 120 s (7 & 87); tess-ebs period ~2.8 d morph 0.481; clear eclipses of ~34% and 24%; slow variability & ellipsoidal effect; ephemeris shifted between S7 and S87; SAP & PDCSAP similar;

0118313102.notes: 8 sectors @ 120 s (8/9/10, 35/36 & 61/62/63); tess-ebs period ~9.3 d morph 0.180; SpT B6V(n); aka V* NT Vel; very deep and sharp eclipses of >40% with secondary near phase 0.4; evidence of pulsations between eclipses; PDCSAP distorts SAP;

0141685465.notes: 22 sectors @ 120 s (4 ... 89); tess-ebs period ~7.8 d morph 0.220; clear eclipses of ~25% & ~6%; PDCSAP introduces distortions so stick with SAP and clip;
